info.name: Spotlight API - Complete Collection
info.description: Complete collection for testing all features in Spotlight API including Authentication (with OAuth support for Google, Facebook, GitHub, Twitter), User Management, Events, Artists, Messages, and comprehensive testing scenarios

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Login with seeded admin account
Login with seeded regular user account
Register a new user account
Login with existing user credentials
Redirect to Google OAuth authorization page
Redirect to Facebook OAuth authorization page
Handle Google OAuth callback with authorization code
Handle Facebook OAuth callback with authorization code
Unlink Google OAuth account from current user
Unlink Facebook OAuth account from current user

exec: // For successful password reset request, we expect either:
console.log('Forgot password request sent for valid email');

request.description: Send password reset email to a valid registered email address

exec: // The endpoint should handle invalid emails gracefully
// without revealing whether the email exists or not
console.log('Forgot password request sent for invalid email');

request.description: Test forgot password with non-existent email address
Render the forgot password form (if using server-side rendering)
Reset password using token from email (replace {{reset_token}} with actual token from email)

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, and OAuth

request.description: Update user profile information with optional banner image upload. You can enable/disable fields as needed.
Update user profile information (JSON format, without file upload)
Get the authenticated user's profile information
Update current authenticated user's profile. All fields are optional. Banner upload is optional.
Upload a banner image for the user profile
Delete user account (requires authentication). This will also revoke all access tokens.
Delete current authenticated user's account
Reset user password using email address
Change password for authenticated user

item.name: Artists Management

request.description: Create a new artist with name and image
Retrieve a paginated list of artists with optional filtering by name.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific artist by its ID.
Update an existing artist. Image upload is optional.
Update artist name only (JSON format, without file upload)
Delete an artist by ID

item.description: Artist management endpoints for creating, updating, and deleting artists

item.name: Events Management

formdata.value: An amazing outdoor music festival featuring top artists from around the world

formdata.description: Array of artist IDs to associate with the event (optional)

request.description: Create a new event with all required information and banner image. All fields are required except description and openHour.

query.description: Filter by event type (concert, festival, exhibition, conference)
Filter by event subtype (rock, hiphop, jazz, techno, classical)
Filter events starting from this date (YYYY-MM-DD)
Filter events ending before this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

request.description: Retrieve a paginated list of events with optional filtering by type, subtype, city, and date range.
Retrieve detailed information about a specific event by its ID.

formdata.value: An updated description for the amazing outdoor music festival

formdata.description: Array of artist IDs to associate with the event (optional, replaces existing associations)

request.description: Update an existing event. All fields are optional. You can enable/disable fields as needed. Banner upload is optional.
Update event information (JSON format, without file upload). All fields are optional.
Delete an event by its ID. This will also delete the associated banner image.
Retrieve all artists associated with a specific event.
Add one or more artists to an existing event. Artists that are already associated will be ignored.
Remove one or more artists from an existing event. Artists that are not associated will be ignored.
Scrape events from Toulouse sources. This endpoint is restricted to admin users only and is used for testing the scraping functionality.

item.description: Event management endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting events, including artist associations

item.name: Bookmarks Management

request.description: Add an event to user's bookmarks
Get all bookmarked events for the authenticated user
Check if an event is bookmarked by the user
Get bookmark statistics for the authenticated user
Remove an event from user's bookmarks

item.description: Bookmark management endpoints for adding, removing, and viewing user's bookmarked events

item.name: Messages Management

request.description: Create a new message for an event
Get all messages for a specific event with pagination
Get details of a specific message
Update an existing message (only the author can update)
Partially update an existing message (only the author can update)
Delete a message (only the author can delete)

item.description: Message management endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting messages within events

item.name: Admin Workflows

request.description: Create a new event (Admin only)
Update an event (Admin only). All fields are optional. Banner upload is optional.
Delete an event (Admin only)
Create a new artist (Admin only)
Update an artist (Admin only)
Delete an artist (Admin only)
Update any user profile (Admin only). All fields are optional. Banner upload is optional.
Delete any user account (Admin only)

item.description: Admin-only operations including event, artist, and user management

item.name: User Workflows

request.description: View all events (User can read only)
View event details (User can read only)

item.name: User Message Operations

request.description: Create a message for an event (User can create)
View messages for an event (User can read)

item.description: User message operations (create and read only)

request.description: Get current user profile
Update own profile. All fields are optional. Banner upload is optional.
Upload user banner image
Bookmark an event
Get user's bookmarked events
Remove bookmark from an event

item.description: Regular user operations with limited permissions
